name: #screenshotsaturday
description:
A game for #MeatlyJam organized by TheMeatly

So, the theme for the event was "All things TheMeatly: Life as a Game Developer" and I wanted to try out something different, no more platformer with replaced sprites and stuff like that.

And thinking about game development and TheMeatly, nothing more important came to my mind apart from twitter phenomenon known as "#screenshotsaturday".

So, this game is a tribute, a bit hard but a good simple one at that.

If you manage to get the perfect shot, do share on twitter tagging me & #MeatlyJam.

SHAMELESS SELF PROMOTION :

Try out my last game Jazz & Blues if you get time, it's a small interactive story based puzzle platformer.
